description:
Provides a Packet project resource to allow you manage devices
in your projects.

Asn.description: Autonomous System Numer for local BGP deployment.

DeploymentType.description: `private` or `public`, the `private` is likely to be usable immediately, the `public` will need to be review by Packet engineers.

Md5.description: Password for BGP session in plaintext (not a checksum).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BackendTransfer.description: Enable or disable [Backend Transfer](https://www.packet.com/developers/docs/network/basic/backend-transfer/), default is false.

OrganizationId.description: The UUID of organization under which you want to create the project. If you leave it out, the project will be create under your the default organization of your account.

PaymentMethodId.description: The UUID of payment method for this project. The payment method and the project need to belong to the same organization (passed with `organization_id`, or default).
